Are you sure you want to delete? There is no going back.
Adjust the threshold of how many peril points activity can receive before it drops out of the list to the fallen category. Activities will be dropped after voting.
Adjust how many points will be given in the first and last vote.
Enabling this will ignore all the activities which no one voted when counting the vote points in the first vote.

All activities receive extra points when voting by the amount of bonus and peril points they have. Enabling this will halve the value of activity\'s extra points in the last vote. Value will be rounded upwards.
All activities receive extra points when voting by the amount of bonus and peril points they have. Enabling this will show the amount of points each activity has when voting.
Enabling this will show the individual points each activity received from every voter.
Points has to be lower than in first vote!
Points has to be higher than in last vote!
Points has to be at least 1!

Welcome to the app!

Start by creating a new list by clicking the \"Lists\" button.

Creating lists

First create a new list by clicking the \"List\" button.

Adding Activities

Add new activity by clicking the \"Add\" button. You need to add at least 7 activities in order to vote, if you are using the default settings. Once you have added 7 activities, you can go back and start voting.

Activity Info

All you need to do is give your activity a name. You can skip the bonus and peril points if this is your first time voting. Usage of bonus and peril points will be explained once you have finished your first vote.

Offline or Online?

You can vote locally by using the same phone and passing it around. You can also vote online if all of the voters have downloaded this app.

Offline Vote

Select the correct list which contains all of the activities which you want to vote on. After that create a new profile for each voter.

Online Vote

Voting online requires that all of the voters have installed this app. You need to give a nickname for yourself in order to vote, regardless of if you are hosting or joining.

Hosting:

If you want to host a new vote room, just give a random 4 letter sequence as the room code. You also need to have enough activities in your selected list in order to start hosting.

Joining:

If you want to join a vote room, you need to use the same room code as the one who has hosted the room. Ask your friends if anyone has already made a vote room.

Voting

If you are using the default settings, you need to vote top 7 activities from the list. The activities which receive the most points will move on to the next round. Only 7 activities can move on to the next round (except if activity 8 and so on has the same amount of points as the 7th activity).

After that you vote again on the remaining activities, but this time you will vote the top 5 from that list, if you are using the default settings.

Last Results

Now that you have finished the last vote, you get to see the final results. Select the activities which you and your friends are going to do and click the \"Save and Exit\" button.

Voting Complete

Congratulations! You have now finished your first vote.

All of the activities that made it to the last vote received 1 bonus point and all of the rest activities received 1 peril point. If you are using the default settings, then the activities which have more than 5 peril points will drop out of the list and you can\'t vote on them on the next vote.

If you want to vote on a dropped activity, you can retrieve it from the \"Fallen\" list, which can be opened from the \"Lists\" menu. By dropping the activities which do not make it into the last vote ensures that the activities which the majority don\'t want to do will fall away from the list.

You should now know the basics pretty well. Make sure to check out the settings so that you can customize the app to your liking. Keep on voting!

Online Beta!

Online voting is still in beta stage. Don\'t worry, your activities will not get lost or altered if something goes wrong. Enjoy!

Note: Vote rooms will be removed after 2 hours has passed from their creation.

No Registration

If you don\'t register, you can only join online votes. If you want to enjoy all of the features that this app has to offer, you need to register an account.

Note: Registration is completely free!
